Short review (6-17-2016 - Might expand later):

+ Fun cat and mouse gameplay
+ Interesting teamwork/solo balance gameplay
+ Different killers/perks/tools/procedural level elements to mix things up

- Several minor release bugs (Certainly soon to be patched)
- Many players blowing up my generators, lol. =P

Seriously though, very fun game with randoms or friends, and minor issues that will certainly be patched up soon enough. =)

[h1]В ЭТО СТОИТ ПОИГРАТЬ[/h1]
Ничего не зная о разработчиках, не до конца понимая смысл, но зато очень впечатлившись бетой, я купил эту игру (МОЖЕТ БЫТЬ ПОТОМУ ЧТО:
1.В игре есть своя стилистическая фишка, никогда раньше не видел ничего подобного.
2.Есть отличная система совместной игры, в которой пока имеются небольшие проблемы, но тем не менее фундамент заложен;
3 Веселый геймплей с интересной прокачкой в виде кровавой паутины, заставляющей отправлятся в туман чаще, чтобы получить заветные очки крови;

Но несмотря на многочисленные плюсы игры, я всё же имею к ней ряд притензий. Давайте будем честными - в игре куча багов, на которые клали разработчики(лучше ебенить в игру новый контент, чтобы публика не расходилась; инересно, сколько проект еще будет жить, до тех пора, пока не умрет, как Evolve); полнейший дисбаланс, аля маньяк 1 ранга, а выжившие - 20, и наоборот. Все это в целом не так страшно, но может испортить первое впечатление об игре, да и второе тоже. 
[h1] СИЕ ТВОРЕНИЕ ПОДАЕТ БОЛЬШИЕ НАДЕЖДЫ, И СКОРЕЕ ВСЕГО МНОГИЕ ПРИВЕДЕННЫЕ МНОЮ МИНУСЫ, КОТОРЫЕ КОНЕЧНО ЖЕ ВЫСОСАНЫ ИЗ ПАЛЬЦА И ВЫТЕКАЮТ ДРУГ ИЗ ДРУГА, БУДУТ ИСПРАВЛЕНЫ, ВЕДЬ ИГРА ТОЛЬКО ВЫШЛА, И Я СОВЕТУЮ ПОПРОБЫВАТЬ ЕЁ КАЖДОМУ, ВСЁ[/h1]
спасибо, кстати.
enraging
刚开始可能不太敢玩，但是玩多了就感觉很好玩了。现在刚出来，很多东西还没设计好，希望Rank分不要那么难打，还有希望多出一些地图和多一些人玩，现在一共就5个人太少了！

All in all, it's a good game.  Yes, there are a few issues, namely the lack of a party system, that need to be fixed.   Playing as the Killer is rewarding (who doesn't want to hang people on hooks?), while play on the Surivor's side is actually thrilling. However, I can't recommend playing it for more than  a match or two at a time.  It might just be me, but the gameplay becomes a bit stagnant after this.  Don't get me wrong, it's a good game, but there are only so many times a day that I can be hung on meat hooks by total strangers.  I love the game, but it's at its best for the first match or two of any given session.  This issue, along with the current (June 17) lack of a party system lead me to this conclusion:

Buy it, and enjoy it.  It's good.  But wait until a sale.

There are a lot of great things going for this game. There are a few major issues with the game. The worst is not being able to join up with friends. You have to have a full group in order to do so. I would take the time to expand on these but I wont. The reason why is, like the game, I wont finsh or include everything I should of. 

Bottom Line: Game seems to be more like in early Beta then a full release. Do not purchase unless you have a group of 5 people to play with. If you do not have a full 5 person party to play with, be aware there are many bugs and oversights. 

Once these are fixed, I am sure I will be recommending this game.

While the game itself is entertaining, it is currently plagued by issues that the devs should of had the foresight to address before launch.

Main Issue: 
People want to play with their friends

Sub-Issue: 
They don't have four other friends with the game, so custom match is out.

Result: 
They join and leave lobbies rapidly to try to get into a match with their friends.  This causes the lobbies to break, and actually finding a match where people ready up is a rare and momentous occasion.

İlk öncelikle oyun süper arkadaşlar tek düze bi oyun tabi caizse ya piskopatsınız parçalayacaksınız ya da masumsunuz ölümünede olsa o jeneratör çalışacak :) alacak arkadaşlara şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum ilk başta bnde araştırıken korku oyunu olsada sonucda oyun diodum ama manyağın yannda geçtiğinde o müzik o kalp atışı fena adrenalin basıo bana göre 10 üzerinden 8

Ya hayatta kacaksın arkadaşlarına yardm edeceksin yada kancayı yiyeceksin aslında uzun uzun yazılmasına gerek yok emin olun aynı şeyleri oynamakdan zevk alacağınız bi oyun
I love this game! awesome idea for a game well worth the 17$. if your interested in this game i highly recommend get this game you won't regret it!

Pros:
- Good value for a $20 game.
- The graphics aren't amazing, but they get the job done with varying resolution options.
- Escaping against a killer that is human controlled is a lot harder than it sounds.
- Different killers and survivors to play as, that form unique traits as you level them up.
- Light cosmetic options, althought I expect they will be added as future DLC for free.

Cons:
- Matchmaking connectivity needs to be fixed. It will sometimes place you in a bad lobby with a horrible connection, or just simply refuse to find a match at all.  And the lag always works in the killer's favor. Playing ranked P2P kinda sucks.

The only common complaint that I see for this game that I will not defend is the ability to play with your friends against other people. This would be very hard to balance. Having a team full of coordinated individuals against one killer would be broken. You would always know where the killer is, and there would be no risk. Blocking communication between the survivors is the only way to ensure the survivors don't have an advantage.


All in all, I think it is a great value for a $20 game. They do need to fix the matchmaking connectivity, but other than that I think it is a fun game to play.
Releasing the game before adding a matchmaking to play with your friends was a bad idea. Dont reccommend this game until they add it.

This game is amazing and keeps you on the edge of your seat but theres a few things that need to be added. First the matchmaking is terrible. But that should be an easy fix and it would be great if they added a party system just for the  surviors. And there needs to be a way of communication because it is nearly impossible to win without it.

The games shows us that a game can be entertaining and fun at a cheap price
Also, if you are a sunday gamer (like me) and hate long gameplay ?

Then this is a game for you, each game last around 15 mins.
During this 15 mins, it doesn't give you fun but also HELL !!

As a survivor, 
-You have to apply on different strategies to hide from the Killer
-You have to have the GUTS to activate the generator, be fast enough to hit the skill check bar and look at your side screens for Killer
- You also have to work as a team to increase the winning chances

As a Killer,
- You also have use your intelligence to hunt down 4 survivors
- You have to be composure, otherwise, you might end up being fooled by a team with group chat
- Dont be greedy, dont chase a single survivor for the entire game, as it will give chances for the rest of the team complete the objectives

WELL, there is so much more to tell but i am gonna let you figure out yourself !

God bless you and Rest In Peace ! ;)

В игру можно играть как 1, так и с друзьми в приватном матче.
Очень круто играть 1, ибо тут никакой коммуникации в плане голосовой связи (хотя это и минус тоже) и игра за жертву становится очень атмосферной, в свою очередь за маньяка играть не пробавал, но судя по оценкам друзей - круто.
С друзьями играть весело, но теряется атмосфера (если играть со скайпом), печально что нету стандартного лобби или браузера серверов, ибо нельзя поиграть с другом за мирных вместе в рандоме (верней это возможно, но нам посчастливилось лишь дважды и то в бета версии).
Хромает немного оптимизация, хотя уровень графики не на столько высок чтоб было чему тормозить.
Также бесит поиск, периодически лагает (сбрасывает), а также опытных игроков кидает к новичкам, что бесит (дизбаланс).

В целом игра прикольная, особенно учитывая цену. Разработчики обещают развивать ее, так что ждем исправления минусов и добавления новых плюсов:)

This game is just terrifyingly brilliant, it is a horror game which we have all been waiting for. There are tons of different perks, offering and addons for each character making your character unique and specifically brilliant and certain things for example a perk may allow you to hear the killing within 12 metres which you can then use to your advantage. However there are a few things which bothered me during the launch of the game and some problems that still occur.

1) During the first few days of the game's launch when I would activate a generator my game would crash and somtimes for random reasons it still crashes.
2) The killer named "Wraith" is very overpowered as you cant hear his heatbeat wile he is clocked making it very difficult to escape from him as he can get very close to you without you knowing he's there.
3) Joining a lobby as a survivor can also be a challenge and can take you up to 8 attempts before the game finally puts you into a lobby.
4) If you are playing as a survivor and the killer decides to leave the game your rank as a survivor wile drop pretty much meaing you lose the game, this must be fixed.

Other than these problems the game does require high end computers to run smooth fps and I would recommend this game to anyone who really wants a challenge.

Не знаю, что написать, поэтому напишу рецепт голубцов. 

Капуста - 1 кочан 
Рис - 200 г 
Фарш мясной - 500 г 
Соль - 1 ч. ложка 
Приправа - 1 ч. ложка (по вкусу) 
Перец черный молотый - по вкусу 
Масло растительное - для жарки 
Для соуса: 
Сметана - 2 ч. ложки 
Томатная паста или кетчуп - 2 ч. ложки 
Приправа - 1 ч. ложка (по вкусу) 
Соевый соус - 1 ч. ложки
Соль - 0,5 ч. ложки 
Вода - 0,5-0,75 стакана 
Продукты для голубцов с фаршем перед вами. 

Как приготовить голубцы с фаршем: 

Капусту разобрать на листья. Поместить в миску, посолить. Вскипятить чайник. Залить кипятком листья, накрыть крышкой и оставить на 15-20 минут. 

Для фарша мясо пропустить через мясорубку. Фарш можно использовать магазинный. 

Рис хорошо промыть и варить в большом количестве подсоленной воды до полуготовности 10-12 минут. Затем рис откинуть на дуршлаг и промыть холодной водой.

Sorry for my bad english, I'm trying to write as good as I can..

After playing this game for 100+ hours I'm happy to say that i highly recommend this game if you're into horror games and teaming up against a bloodthirsty murderer. 

Why? Because it's fun to play with, yes it's a new game and it need some bugs to be fixed and especially the matchmaking. However, I think this game is a really good game, I like the concept and I really like the design. 

Why you don't recommend this understandable and not understandable at the same time, this is a new game, it's gonna get some updates soon, I've already seen a few ones that have fixed the loading screen etc. If you wanna play this game, then team up with eachother for gods sake. If you play as a survivor of course. If you play as the killer then play smart.

The devs are currently working on patch 2.0 which is going to do a lot of fixes and the patch even got a "play with friends" function in it. The release for this patch is unkown but if you wanna take a closer look then go to the forums and you'll see it there. I really enjoy this game, it's frustrating, scary and funny at the same time. The rankup system is a bit buggy, but as I mentioned before, they are working on a patch that will fix the most common bugs in the game.

I'll edit my review as soon as the new patch comes out and after a few games.
______________________________________________________________

1.0.2
Finally, the new patch has come out and yet it's no "play with friends" online function in the game. They fixed some issues but screw a lot of other things up.. Now it's even more harder to play as a survivor and easier to kill if you're a killer, reviving yourself takes longer time. Since they set a max for blood points to 500,000 i've lost my interest in playing this game, now that I've almost spent 200 hours on this game by saving a lot of points for the new survivors and killers to come is all worthless. If you have 500,000 and play a game you will no longer earn points, you need to spend your points if you want to earn more, why whould you set a max for blood points devs? This is totally ridiculous. If you want this game to keep on going you have to deal with the cheaters and patch this saving file cheating, but instead you punish everyone by simply deleting our points down to 500,000? 

I'm sorry but I no longer highly recommend you to play this game anymore. It's just not worth the time anymore, if you wanna play this game then please wait till they let you actually play with your friends online and not fuck up your points like they did with mine.

As soon as a more better update comes out I'll edit my review for this game.
______________________________________________________________

1.0.5

New patches, finally. A couple of weeks ago we finally got a new function called "survive with friends", I am very happy for that and I've spent even more hours playing this game. 600 hours overall now and the game is starting to be a funny game to play again. I like the new changes, we have got new outfits and devs finally nerfed NOED (No one escapes death) which is great, For those who don't know what kind of perk that is, the NOED perk is a overpowered perk that allows the killer to kill you or hit you down in ONE HIT. Now the perk got a timer which is 2 mins which is good. Everything is good now, but they have still not fixed the matchmaking and the stupid "no matches found" issue. Everytime this comes up, every single person in the lobby have to click ready again. 

This is really annoying and stupid time waste. The other issue is killer leaving the lobby which is even more annoying, you're a rank 1 survivor, your friends are rank 1, rank 10 and 20. It takes about 10 mins for us to actually join a lobby. When we finally join a lobby it's 50% chance the host will stay and 50% chance the host will leave which happens a lot.. Devs have already comfirmed that they will hide our ranks from the killer, so I guess the killer will only look for a bloody outfit (prestige outfits are bloody). Great job devs for fixing this! I look forward for new updates and I'll see you againg.

Be warned though: Partying with friends doesn't give you any experience and it not possible with other random people, to avoid abusing of the scoring system. They might change that later.

Other than that, solid, runs perfect only encountered one visual hilarious glitch so far.
If you play it solo, i can't recommend it enough and i am sure they will find a solution for the open party system.

Edit: It's been 5 years and it's one of the most played games for me. What can i say, quite legendary.

You are unable to make a lobby in where you and yuor friend(s) join each other together with randomers to try and survive the monster. It is highly frustrating to get killed and the likeliness of survival is all about the experience of yourself and other players. NOT about the skill of the monster, as you really have to be dim not to kill every single one of them.

Игра говно. Плохой сеттинг,так же нет синхронизации лобби. По большей части тупое и гнилое коммунити,хук-кемпинг выживших и прочая хуйня. Игра перестает быть страшной после 1го часа гемплея. Анимация тупая и топорная такая-же как и графоуний. Из всех наигранных мной 15 часов в этой игре,я потратил около 3х часов на то ,чтоб приконнектиться и поиграть с другом в паблик-пулл. 4/10

Хотите нормальных игроков в вашу команду? Хотите интересного маньяка? А может вы хотите без проблем присоединиться в игру к вашему другу? Тогда эта игра не для вас. Здесь вы этого не найдете, проходите мимо.
This game has a great idea behind it but is poorly executed. All the other reviews contain most of my complaints.

When this game was released, I sat down and started it up for my first round. I can still remember the feeling I had playing that first match. It was a feeling of euphoric terror that I am rarely able to feel. The reason I still remember it so vividly is that almost every single match out of my 40+ hours in the last 2 weeks have had that feeling. The game had a rough start and I was ready to get rid of it, but I didn't, and now we're here, with me telling you to go buy this game.

This game has come a long way from where it started, there are people constantly bitching about the killers camping them and the fact that there still is no "Survive with Friends" mode, as well as various other petty complaints. I do share in some of them, but at the same time, I am loving this game. I'll refuse to go play CS:GO or DayZ with my friends because I want to climb up the rank system a little further, or I'm a few Bloodpoints away from the next level of a character. It's this type of game that is so intertwined that I just can't seem to want to put it down.

The devs have released two patches since the game was released, each with a hearty supply of updates, bug fixes, balances, reworks, graphical improvements, and so much more. I have a feeling that this will continue. So you came to the reviews to see if you should buy the game or not, you should, because it is easily in my top ten all time at this point and I've owned and played well over 1000 separate titles. Enjoy, you won't regret your decision.

Game is fun but like a lot of the other ppl say it needs polishing. No chat is horrible because you cant coordinate anything, no group match making, there needs to be some sort of punishment for ppl who run and hide and do nothing while you run around trying to get all the generators or get killed off, also camping hooks should carry a punishment must of the time a killer hooks somone and just watches them die so you cant really help the dude out. As of right now I can't recommend this game until it gets a look over and the devs polish it up and listen to the players.

послн 8 часов игры в нее, престал бояться некоторых ужастков))Первые несколько часов реально очень стремно, бегаешь, осматриваешь все. Примерно после 6 часов ты просто начинаешь угарать, когда включил игру в первый раз, улыбался потому что выбрасывался адреналин, щас же улыбаешьбся потому что реально ДИКИЙ УГАР.
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты повесил чувака на крючок, а он сразу спрыгнул
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играешь за маньяка с капканами и сам в них наступаешь
Dead by Daylight - это когда вы в 3-оем чините генератор, а нивидимый бомж оказывается позади вас, и вы как угарелые бежите от него И СТОПИТЕ друг друга, итог-крючок
Dead by Daylight - это когда вы открыли ворота, и начинаете угарать над маньяком
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты помогаешь чуваку висящему на крючке, но в итоге к тебе подбегают сзади и рубасят ТЕБЯ, итог- крючок
Dead by Daylight - это когда не можешь найти сервер

КРЧ МОГУ СКАЗАТЬ ЧТО ИГРУХА НОРМАС, ПОБЕГАТЬ ПОУГАРАТЬ. 10 невидимых пидоров из 10

The game has an interesting and fun concept. I played the demo before the release for a copious amount of hours. It has great atmosphere and the tension is there. I do have to say, however, that the network connectivity is HORRIBLE, not just thanks to the reasons that other players have already pointed out (the direct connection to the Killer, who apparently acts as the host server, and no party system), but also because, on numerous occasions, hitting the "Quick play" button at the main menu just takes you to the load screen and then loops back to the menu, which isn't to say that no game was found (the demo version actually told you so), but appears instead to be some sort of bug. This is REALLY annoying and should've been fixed before fully releasing this game. So even though the concept itself is really interesting, I can't recommend this at present time and will change my negative review one these issues have been fixed.
This game is very cool. Its extremely fun to play with friends. i would buy it again
A very good game if you wanna play solo everytime and if you have a qwerty keybord, so thats not a very good game for me ... I hope i won't waste my money for too long.

Although I think the game itself is good, there are some points destructing the game at his current state:

1. There is no party-system for you and your friends which means if you want to play together you either create a private game or join and leave multiple lobbies until you find your companion. This results in waiting and frustrating other players who wait in a lobby. It is pure luck to get into the same lobby. Personally I think in a multiplayer-game which is based on co-op it is just plain stupid not to include that, anyway they are working on it.

2. Some people mentioned big problems with latency and diverse connection problems. As it is right now I can not agree with these statements, but I think it is an issue for many players that should be fixed.

3. A server-browser would be nice or some kind of lobby-browser. 

4. Sometimes you click on "join a lobby" and it instantly failed. Why? I mean there should not be an issue with players right?

Additionally other players have problems with matchmaking, too few configuration options, framerate-issues etc.
I never experienced these points, nevertheless I think it is worth mentioning.

TL;DR Shall I buy it? Not yet. Just wait a few weeks - then it is hopefully enjoyable.

If the main points are fixed, I will happily change this into a positive review.

EDIT:

1. Survive with friends is finally in the game! You are now able to build groups and search for games. Although it takes some time depending on the numbers of players in the group, it is much more enjoyable right now.

2. I experienced in my playtime just once a steam disconnect. The latency of each game depends on the killer - if you play in Vietnam, you will most likely get a killer from there.

3. If they improve the lobby-finding, a lobby-browser is not needed, but would be a nice thing.

4. This point remains, but also depends on download-region.

TL;DR

I think, as it is right now, you can purchase this game. It makes a lot of fun, especially with friends. Some bugs may hurt the overall experience, but in Bethesda games no one is complaining, too - right?
